operatingsystemsupport: MS Windows 7, Apple Mac OS X 10.5.x or later, MS Windows Vista, MS Windows XP SP2
flashmodes: Fill-in mode, auto mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction
additionalfeatures: Audio recording, direct print, USB 2.0 compatibility, built-in speaker, auto power save, date/time stamp, sharpness control, digital image rotation, PictBridge support, in-camera red-eye removal, cropping an image, Anti-Shake DSP, face detection, Smile Detection technology
